## Source: ossf-package-analysis (315d3186e692fd6934de0d66c25255e03eb763a15daa0785e92e58a2abbbba60)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'cx-api-client-lite' @ 200.0.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
